short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives health analysis report, based on user preferrences

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension helps user in making healthy choices while shopping for food online.
It tells user whether particular food item complies with their dietary needs or not, and also suggests alternatives to them.
Right now this chrome extension only works with blinkit.
